Package com.github.ocraft.s2client.bot

Class S2Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ocraft.s2client.bot.S2Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientEvents
    public abstract class S2Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for user defined bots.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      S2Agent()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ActionInterface actions()
      Interface for issuing actions to units.
      ActionFeatureLayerInterface actionsFeatureLayer()
      Interface for issuing actions in feature layers.
      AgentControlInterface agentControl()
      The AgentControlInterface is only currently used for restarting a game.
      ControlInterface control()
      The ControlInterface is only meant to be used by the coordinator as it provides functionality for connecting to Starcraft2, setting up a websocket connection and issuing blocking commands via SC2's protocol.
      DebugInterface debug()
      The DebugInterface allows a derived class to print text, draw primitive shapes and spawn/destroy units.
      ObservationInterface observation()
      The ObservationInterface is used to query game state.
      QueryInterface query()
      The QueryInterface interface is used to issue commands to units.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.ocraft.s2client.bot.ClientEvents

        onBuildingConstructionComplete, onError, onGameEnd, onGameFullStart, onGameStart, onNuclearLaunchDetected, onNydusDetected, onStep, onUnitCreated, onUnitDestroyed, onUnitEnterVision, onUnitIdle, onUpgradeCompleted

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • S2Agent

        public S2Agent()

    • Method Detail

      • actions

        public ActionInterface actions()
        Interface for issuing actions to units. Actions should be batched via the UnitCommand functions then eventually dispatched with SendActions. If you are stepping the simulation yourself the Step will automatically call SendActions. If your bot is running in real time you must call SendActions yourself.
        Returns:
        The raw (basic) action interface.

      • actionsFeatureLayer

        public ActionFeatureLayerInterface actionsFeatureLayer()
        Interface for issuing actions in feature layers.
        Returns:
        The feature layer action interface.

      • agentControl

        public AgentControlInterface agentControl()
        The AgentControlInterface is only currently used for restarting a game. For internal use.
        Returns:
        The agent control interface.

      • observation

        public ObservationInterface observation()
        The ObservationInterface is used to query game state.

      • query

        public QueryInterface query()
        The QueryInterface interface is used to issue commands to units.

      • debug

        public DebugInterface debug()
        The DebugInterface allows a derived class to print text, draw primitive shapes and spawn/destroy units.

      • control

        public ControlInterface control()
        The ControlInterface is only meant to be used by the coordinator as it provides functionality for connecting to Starcraft2, setting up a websocket connection and issuing blocking commands via SC2's protocol.
